original_text: How can you say to your brother, ‘Let me take the speck out of your eye,’ when all the time there is a plank in your own eye?
korean_text: 보라 네 눈 속에 들보가 있는데 어찌하여 형제에게 말하기를 나로 네 눈 속에 있는 티를 빼게 하라 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: How can you say to your brother,
'Let me take the speck out of your eye,'
there is a plank in your own eye?
